overview: A humble cleaner enters Heartbreak Season 1, a TV reality show where the most heartbroken wins the grand prize. He narrates his pathetic story of how finding love on a deserted island caused him to end up reinventing his life in the most spectacular fashion.Starring Yul Edochie, Cha Cha Eke Faani, Eve Esin, Marcathy Nonwani and Duke Emmanuel
title: Treasure
